messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, I am standing as I want to put some integrity back into politics. Too many politicians think it is alright to lie, to misrepresent the truth and bend the rules. I think this is wrong. Politician must be an example for others. They must work with honesty and always be ready to do what is right-right for this country and the people of this country. We want a good honest and sincere party and politicians that run this country and I will be fighting to be one among them.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am standing as I want to put some integrity back into politics.
